BABONUS.AvailableFiltersTooltip: The list of filters you can apply to this bonus, further narrowing down which rolls it should apply to. Each filter must be true for the bonus to apply.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraInvalid: This bonus is not currently able to act as an aura.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraRangeTooltip: The range of the aura, measured in feet (put in '-1' for an unlimited range). This field supports roll data.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraRequireLightToo: If checked, the aura will be restricted by anything that blocks light.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraRequireMoveTool: If checked, the aura will be restricted by anything that blocks movement.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraRequireSightToo: If checked, the aura will be restricted by anything that blocks vision.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraRequireSoundToo: If checked, the aura will be restricted by anything that blocks sound.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraRequireTooltip: Specific canvas-related properties that are required for the aura to affect a target.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraTemplateTooltip: If the aura affects the area within a Measured Template instead of having a range (for items that are able to place a template).
The parent of this babonus is not an item.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraTooltip: Configure whether and how the bonus acts as an aura.
BABONUS.ConfigurationAuraValidTargetsToo: Which targets should be affected by this aura, relative to the disposition of the origin token.
BABONUS.ConfigurationConsumptionInvalid: This bonus is not currently able to consume any values.
BABONUS.ConfigurationConsumptionTooltip: Configure whether and how the bonus consumes a property.
BABONUS.ConfigurationConsumptionTooltipU: A bonus cannot be set to consume unless it is optional.
BABONUS.ConfigurationCopyTooltip: Create a duplicate of this bonus
BABONUS.ConfigurationDeleteAreYouSure: Are you sure that you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
BABONUS.ConfigurationDeleteTooltip: Delete this bonus from this document
BABONUS.ConfigurationEnabledTooltip: Toggle this bonus on or off. A bonus that is toggled off will be completely ignored
BABONUS.ConfigurationExclusiveTooltip: Toggle whether this bonus applies only to the item on which it is created.
BABONUS.ConfigurationExclusiveTooltipUna: A bonus cannot be set to apply to one specific item only, unless created on said item, and applying to attack, damage, save DCs, or tool checks.
BABONUS.ConfigurationOptionalTooltip: Toggle whether this bonus should be opted into when rolling.
BABONUS.ConfigurationOptionalTooltipUnav: A bonus cannot be set to be optional unless it provides an additive bonus on top of an attack roll, damage roll, saving throw, or ability check.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeCurrencyUnavailab: You do not have the required amount of that denomination.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeEffectUnavailable: The associated effect no longer exists.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeHealthUnavailable: You do not have enough hit points remaining.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeHitdiceUnavailabl: You do not have enough hit dice remaining.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeQuantityUnavailab: You do not have the required quantity of the associated item.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeSlotsUnavailable: You do not have any remaining spell slots of that level.
BABONUS.ConsumptionTypeUsesUnavailable: You do not have the required number of charges on the item.
BABONUS.CurrentBonusesTooltip: The bonuses you have created that are currently stored on this Actor, Item, or ActiveEffect.
BABONUS.CurrentFiltersTooltip: The filters currently applied to the bonus, further narrowing down which rolls it should apply to. Each filter must be true for the bonus to apply.
BABONUS.FiltersAbilitiesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, save DCs, and ability checks.
BABONUS.FiltersAbilitiesTooltip: The ability score used for the roll. This respects items set to use defaults, such as spells using the spellcasting ability, or finesse weapons using either Strength or Dexterity.
BABONUS.FiltersActorCreatureSizesTooltip: The size this creature must be one of.
BABONUS.FiltersActorCreatureTypesTooltip: The type of creature the rolling actor must be one of (or have as a subtype), or the type of creature the rolling actor must not be one of. For example 'undead', 'fey', or 'construct'.
BABONUS.FiltersActorLanguagesTooltip: The languages the actor must be able to speak one of, or none of.
BABONUS.FiltersArbitraryComparisonToolti: Insert numbers, roll data properties, strings, or a combination of the three, that must be in a specific relationship for the bonus to apply. This comparison can evaluate substrings by using either of the inequalities. You can also use roll data from a targeted token's actor by prepending with '@target'.
BABONUS.FiltersAttackTypesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls or damage rolls.
BABONUS.FiltersAttackTypesTooltip: The type of attack roll the item must have for the bonus to apply. For example if you cast a spell that must involve a ranged spell attack (rsak) or melee weapon attack (mwak).
BABONUS.FiltersAuraBlockersTooltip: The status conditions that block an aura from being transferred, such as a paladin's aura that is only active while the paladin is neither dead nor unconscious.
BABONUS.FiltersBaseArmorsTooltip: The type of armor you must be wearing one of or must be wearing none of for the bonus to apply, including shields.
BABONUS.FiltersBaseToolsRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to ability checks.
BABONUS.FiltersBaseToolsTooltip: The types of tools the item must be one of or none of for the bonus to apply. For example Herbalism Kit, Thieves' Tools, or Cobbler's Tools.
BABONUS.FiltersBaseWeaponsRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersBaseWeaponsTooltip: The types of weapons the item must be one of or none of for the bonus to apply. For example Battleaxe, Shortbow, or Longsword.
BABONUS.FiltersCreatureTypesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, save DCs, and saving throws.
BABONUS.FiltersCreatureTypesTooltip: The type of creature the target actor must be one of (or have as a subtype), or the type of creature the target must not be one of. For example 'undead', 'fey', or 'construct'.
BABONUS.FiltersCustomScriptsTooltip: Any custom script you want to write yourself. The script has to be completely synchronous and must return true or false. As helper variables, the script is supplied with 'token', 'actor', 'item', and 'bonus', if applicable.
BABONUS.FiltersDamageTypesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersDamageTypesTooltip: The type of damage the item must deal for the bonus to apply or must not deal for the bonus to apply. For example if a spell deals fire damage.
BABONUS.FiltersFeatureTypesTooltip: The type and subtype a feature-type item must be. For example a class feature, ki feature, or monster feature.
BABONUS.FiltersHealthPercentagesTooltip: The percentage of health the actor must at least have, or at most have, for the bonus to apply.
BABONUS.FiltersItemTypesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersItemTypesTooltip: The types of items the bonus should apply to. For example if the item should only apply to spells or only to weapons.
BABONUS.FiltersPreparationModesRequireme: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersPreparationModesTooltip: The type of preparation mode the spell must be set to for the bonus to apply, such as 'pact' for pact magic, or 'at will'.
BABONUS.FiltersProficiencyLevelsRequirem: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
BABONUS.FiltersProficiencyLevelsTooltip: The level of proficiency that the actor must have with the roll made.
BABONUS.FiltersRemainingSpellSlotsToolti: The minimum and maximum total number of remaining spell slots the actor must have for the bonus to apply. For example if you want a bonus to apply only if you have 3 spell slots or more remaining, or no spell slots remaining at all.
BABONUS.FiltersSaveAbilitiesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersSaveAbilitiesTooltip: The ability that must be used to set the saving throw DC of the item for the bonus to apply; for example a Battle Master fighter who determines their Maneuver DC with Dexterity. This can be different from the ability the item otherwise uses. If an item is set to scale with 'Spellcasting', the actor's spellcasting ability is compared against.
BABONUS.FiltersSkillIdsRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to ability checks.
BABONUS.FiltersSkillIdsTooltip: The types of skills the roll must be one of or none of for the bonus to apply. For example Athletics, Nature, or Survival.
BABONUS.FiltersSpellComponentsRequiremen: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersSpellComponentsTooltip: The components or spell tags the spell must have for the bonus to apply. You can choose whether the spell must have all of the given components or tags, or at least one of them. For example if you want a bonus to apply to all spells that require concentration.
BABONUS.FiltersSpellLevelsRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersSpellLevelsTooltip: The level at which the spell must be cast for the bonus to apply. You can select each level individually. For example, you can have a bonus apply only to cantrips, only to leveled spells, or only to spells of 3rd level or below.
BABONUS.FiltersSpellSchoolsRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersSpellSchoolsTooltip: The school the spell must belong to for the bonus to apply. If multiple schools are selected, the spell must belong to any one of them. For example, if you want a bonus to apply only to Divination spells.
BABONUS.FiltersStatusEffectsTooltip: The conditions the actor must be affected by or must not be affected by, using the effect's set of statuses.
BABONUS.FiltersTargetEffectsRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, save DCs, and saving throws.
BABONUS.FiltersTargetEffectsTooltip: The conditions the target actor must be affected by or must not be affected by, using the effect's set of statuses.
BABONUS.FiltersThrowTypesRequirements: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to saving throws.
BABONUS.FiltersThrowTypesTooltip: The type of saving throw the bonus should apply to. This also applies to death saving throws, and you can adjust the target value of death saves as well.
BABONUS.FiltersTokenSizesTooltip: The size of the targeted token, and whether to compare against the rolling token as well. If checked, the target must be at least or at most as big as the roller.
BABONUS.FiltersWeaponPropertiesRequireme: This filter is only available for bonuses applying to attack rolls, damage rolls, and save DCs.
BABONUS.FiltersWeaponPropertiesTooltip: The weapon properties the item either must have or cannot have for the bonus to apply. If any are selected, the weapon must have at least one of the included properties, and none of the excluded properties. For example if you want a bonus to apply only to Two-Handed weapons.
BABONUS.ModifiersFirstTooltip: If checked, the die modifiers only apply to the first die in the full expression.
BABONUS.OverviewCopied: The uuid has been copied to clipboard.
BABONUS.SelectTypeTooltip: Select a type for your new bonus; the kind of roll to which it should apply.
BABONUS.SettingsAllowFumbleNegationHint: Allow for modifiers to the fumble range on attack rolls to go below 1?
BABONUS.SettingsDisableCustomScriptFilte: Disable the 'Custom Script' filters from having their values read. Instead the filter always immediately returns true. Enable this setting if you prefer other users not executing scripts.
BABONUS.SettingsDisplayLabelHint: If checked, the label is displayed in the header of applicable actors, items, and effects.
BABONUS.SettingsShowAuraRangesHint: Create a visual indicator for the ranges of babonus auras. This does not apply to template auras or auras with unlimited ranges. If the roller is within an aura, it is marked green, otherwise red.
BABONUS.SettingsShowBuilderForPlayersHin: If disabled, the icon to enter the builder will not be available in the header for players.
BABONUS.SettingsShowSheetTabHint: Add a new tab on the character sheet rather than adding a header button.
BABONUS.TypeAttackBonusTooltip: Additional parts to add on top of the attack roll.
BABONUS.TypeAttackCriticalRangeTooltip: An integer to subtract from the critical range of the attack roll. This field respects roll data, but not dice rolls.
BABONUS.TypeAttackFumbleRangeTooltip: An integer to add to the fumble range of the attack roll. This field respects roll data, but not dice rolls.
BABONUS.TypeDamageBonusTooltip: Additional parts to add on top of the damage roll.
BABONUS.TypeDamageCriticalBonusDamageToo: Additional parts to add on top of the damage roll on critical hits.
BABONUS.TypeDamageCriticalBonusDiceToolt: An additional number of dice that should be rolled on a critical hit. This field respects roll data, but not dice rolls.
BABONUS.TypeHitdieBonusTooltip: Additional parts to add on top of the hit die roll.
BABONUS.TypeSaveBonusTooltip: An integer to add onto the DC of a saving throw. This field respects roll data, but not dice rolls.
BABONUS.TypeTestBonusTooltip: Additional parts to add on top of the ability check.
BABONUS.TypeThrowBonusTooltip: Additional parts to add on top of the saving throw roll.
BABONUS.TypeThrowDeathSaveCriticalToolti: An integer to subtract from the threshold that decides when a Death Saving Throw results in restoring consciousness and 1 hit point. This field respects roll data, but not dice rolls.
BABONUS.TypeThrowTargetValueTooltip: An integer to subtract from the minimum requirement to pass a saving throw. This field respects roll data, but not dice rolls.
